divs: sighting detailson the evening of 5\7\12 at 2106 local while walking my dog.i looked to the east toward the pierce county airport. i always look at the sky being an old pilot and aircraft mechanic. the righthand traffic pattern landing to the north goes directly over my home. i observed first one ogange\red object within 2-3 minutes i was looking at four objects. the color being emmitted from the objects were not red collision lights. in fact the only lights i observed were orange\red pulsating, no bright white strobes. the objects appeared in a more or less climbing straight line. living within 15 miles of joint ft. lewis and mccord ab my first thought was that i was watching four helicopters in trail returning to ft.lewis. however after watching the objects for 2-3 minutes they didnot fly over my home on the way back to the fort. the first object continued to assend to my guess would be above 2500'-3000' at which time its light blinked out. within two minutes the second, third, and forth objects did exactly the same. while flying westbound and having all four objects in sight a light aircraft on final approach to pierce county airport passed under the objects by 500'-1000'
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Puyallup
There were no other sightings in Puyallup on or around May 7th 2012
Summary: While walking my dog, I looked to the east and observed 4 objects assending in a fairly straight line westbound. All 4 objects were orange/red in color. After observing all 4 objects for 2-3 min.All 4 objects blinked out in order.
